SELECT ci.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECRUIT r JOIN CORP_MEM cm ON r.MEM_NO = cm.MEM_NO WHERE cm.CORP_NO = ci.CORP_NO AND r.RECRUIT_STATUS = 0) AS RECRUIT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_CORP fc WHERE fc.CORP_NO = ci.CORP_NO) AS TOTAL_FAVS,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_CORP fc WHERE fc.CORP_NO = ci.CORP_NO AND fc.MEM_NO = #{memNo}) AS IS_SAVED, #{memNo} AS MEM_NO
0 AS IS_SAVED, NULL AS MEM_NO
FROM CORP_INFO ci
1=1
AND LOWER(ci.CORP_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{query}) || '%'
ORDER BY ( 2 * (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_CORP fc WHERE fc.CORP_NO = ci.CORP_NO) + 1 * (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECRUIT r JOIN CORP_MEM cm ON r.MEM_NO = cm.MEM_NO WHERE cm.CORP_NO = ci.CORP_NO AND r.RECRUIT_STATUS = 0) ) DESC
ORDER BY ci.CORP_NAME ASC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ci.*, COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RECRUIT r JOIN CORP_MEM cm ON cm.MEM_NO = r.MEM_NO WHERE cm.CORP_NO = ci.CORP_NO AND r.RECRUIT_STATUS = 0 ), 0) AS RECRUIT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_CORP fc WHERE fc.CORP_NO = ci.CORP_NO) AS TOTAL_FAVS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_CORP fc WHERE fc.CORP_NO = ci.CORP_NO AND fc.MEM_NO = #{memNo}) AS IS_SAVED, #{memNo} AS MEM_NO FROM CORP_INFO ci WHERE ci.CORP_NO = #{corpNo}
